chinese: 彼采葛兮。一日不見、如三月兮。
english: There he is gathering the dolichos!A day without seeing him,Is like three months!

chinese: 彼采蕭兮。一日不見、如三秋兮。
english: There he is gathering the oxtail-southern-wood!A day without seeing him,Is like three seasons!

chinese: 彼采艾兮。一日不見、如三歲兮。
english: There he is gathering the mugwort!A day without seeing him,Is like three years!
